mapper.select: select * from v_curriculum where v_curriculum.TeacherJobID = #{TeacherJobID,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by weekday ,SECTION ASC

SELECT * FROM v_curriculum vc LEFT JOIN (SELECT c.CurriculumId CurriculumId1 ,c.QrcodeInfo FROM yw_classroom c WHERE date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') BETWEEN date_format(c.StratTime, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s')AND date_format(c.EndTime, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') ) as v on vc.CurriculumId=v.CurriculumId1 WHERE vc.TeacherJobID =#{0} and vc.WeekDay =#{1}
SELECT * FROM v_curriculum WHERE v_curriculum.TeacherJobID = #{0} AND v_curriculum.WeekDay = #{1} AND v_curriculum.Section= #{2}

SELECT DISTINCT v_students_att.StudentName, v_students_att.StudentNumber, v_students_att.ClassName, v_students_att.ClassRoomId, yw_classroom.CurriculumId FROM yw_classroom , v_students_att WHERE yw_classroom.CurriculumId = v_students_att.CurriculumId AND yw_classroom.CurriculumId = #{0} OR v_students_att.ClassRoomId IS NULL

SELECT C.ClassRoomId,c.CurriculumId,c.QrcodeInfo FROM yw_classroom c WHERE date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') BETWEEN date_format(c.StratTime, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') AND date_format(c.EndTime, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') AND c.CurriculumId=#{0}
